parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to toggle the dimmer on or off

parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to read the actual status of the dimmer

parameter.name: positionGA

parameter.description: The group address in x/y/z notation to set the absolute position of the dimmer

parameter.name: increasedecreaseGA

parameter.name: dimvalueGA
